predicate.note: Frames file for 'mark' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry image_impression-25.1, other framed members include sign. Comparison with 'notch' and 'draw'.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Gulf Power's guilty plea before U.S. District Judge Robert L. Vining yesterday marks the end of only one part of a wide-ranging inquiry of Southern Co.
example.arg: Gulf Power's guilty plea before U.S. District Judge Robert L. Vining
the end of only one part of a wide-ranging inquiry of Southern Co

roleset.name: make a mark

example.name: all args
example.text: John marked his name on the contract with a purple crayon.

example.name: maybe a better example
example.text: Like many male cats, John marked his territory.

roleset.note: I'll leave the arg3 to your imagination.

example.name: PAS!
example.text: Our hard-working team of annotators is marking up the Wall Street Journal with semantic roles.

roleset.name: raise the price

example.name: transitive
example.text: ``On occasion, he paid a high price,'' Mr. Wachter concedes, but he says those who bid less and dropped out were dealers who would then have marked up the paintings to resell them at a profit to collectors.
example.arg: to resell them at a profit to collectors

roleset.note: Might need other args for "amount price changed by" or "final price" or "original price" depending on what examples appear. If you find such an example, send it to me.
